name: Akshat Patidar
position: Data Scientist @ OLA Krutrim | Building India's first Foundational LLM

current_company.name: Krutrim
current_company.title: Data Scientist @ OLA Krutrim | Building India's first Foundational LLM

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Objective: To research anomaly detection and implement machine learning to detect anomalies in the dataset• Converted the obtained network connection data from string format to excel file in dataset format by using the pandas library• Preprocessed 32 features of dataset like filling null values and removing unnecessary data and selected 17 features from it• Analyzed and observed the correlation between features by plotting heat map and pair plot using the seaborn library in python• Concluded Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) to visualize data in plots and graphs and delivered it in a more presentable way• Created a baseline based on the previous history and deviation from an identified baseline to detect outliers in the dataset• Used Unsupervised Machine Learning algorithm(K-Means Clustering) on the dataset to build a cost-efficient model than baseline• Used Deep Learning concept to build LSTM autoencoder algorithm for anomaly detection and trained it on the obtained dataset
experience.description_html: Objective: To research anomaly detection and implement machine learning to detect anomalies in the dataset• Converted the obtained network connection data from string format to excel file in dataset format by using the pandas library• Preprocessed 32 features of dataset like filling null values and removing unnecessary data and selected 17 features from it• Analyzed and observed the correlation between features by plotting heat map and pair plot using the seaborn library in python• Concluded Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) to visualize data in plots and graphs and delivered it in a more presentable way• Created a baseline based on the previous history and deviation from an identified baseline to detect outliers in the dataset• Used Unsupervised Machine Learning algorithm(K-Means Clustering) on the dataset to build a cost-efficient model than baseline• Used Deep Learning concept to build LSTM autoencoder algorithm for anomaly detection and trained it on the obtained dataset

positions.subtitle: Prithvi IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: PRITHVI is an initiative of the Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG), IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter, in association with the American Association of Petroleum Geologists (AAPG), IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter and Society Of Petroleum Geophysicists, IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter also along with the students of the Department of Geology and Geophysics.• Spearheaded a team of 32 executive members for nationwide publicity of the symposium across around 60 Universities• Successfully secured sponsorship deal from NGRI and coordinated 12 Earth-Sciences events, guest lectures, and workshops• Reduced overall budget of procurement by 15% through several on-ground measures, saving a sum of around INR 30,000
positions.title: Executive Head
positions.description_html:
PRITHVI is an initiative of the Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG), IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter, in association with the American Association of Petroleum Geologists (AAPG), IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter and Society Of Petroleum Geophysicists, IIT Kharagpur Student Chapter also along with the students of the Department of Geology and Geophysics.

• Spearheaded a team of 32 executive members for nationwide publicity of the symposium across around 60 Universities
• Successfully secured sponsorship deal from NGRI and coordinated 12 Earth-Sciences events, guest lectures, and workshops
• Reduced overall budget of procurement by 15% through several on-ground measures, saving a sum of around INR 30,000

positions.subtitle: Prithvi IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Lead a team of 10 campus ambassadors from Tamil Nadu which led to an increase in participation by 200% for the first time• Collectively achieved highest ever outstation participation in Prithvi 2019 with 15% YoY increase &2000+ online registrations
positions.title: Executive Member
